definition: to take a breath (in swimming)/to ventilate
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.chinese: 对换气机的节能性进行了分析。

sentences.english: Sam, aged six, is just one of around 60 people in Britain with congenital central hypoventilation syndrome (CCHS), which means he often stops breathing.
sentences.chinese: 现年6岁的Sam患有先天中枢性换气不足症候群。

sentences.english: But the musicians change their breath by a unique cheek-bulging technique.
sentences.chinese: 只不过他们是用了一种很独特的鼓腮换气法。

sentences.english: The Industrial Ventilation Fan is ideal for use in factories and warehouses.
sentences.chinese: 工业换气扇是工厂和仓库的理想选择。

sentences.english: Model B: with sound insulating device, your good will will come true - close door, enjoy ventilation moment.
sentences.chinese: 模式可通过加消音通风器实现关着门换气的美好愿望。

sentences.english: I can't do the breaststroke very well because I always hold my breath.
sentences.chinese: 我蛙式游得很糟，因为我不会换气。

sentences.english: The room has too few windows. A ventilator must be installed.
sentences.chinese: 窗户太少，必须得安个换气扇。

sentences.english: The new- repaired residence is best after valid airiness change air for 3 months.
sentences.chinese: 新装修的住宅最好在有效通风换气3个月后入住。

sentences.english: When radon ventilation fans are added radon levels can even be reduced further.
sentences.chinese: 当增加氡换气扇时，可进一步降低氡的水平。

sentences.english: The room installed with stoves should have powerful ventilator.
sentences.chinese: 安装灶具的房间必须安装强力换气扇。

sentences.english: The most frequent reason for instituting mechanical ventilation is to decrease a patient's work of breathing.
sentences.chinese: 减少呼吸作功是给予病人机械换气的最主要原因。

sentences.english: When you switch on the light in the bathroom, the extractor fan switch on.
sentences.chinese: 当你打开浴室里的灯时，换气扇就启动了。

sentences.english: H. Observe lung inflations and auscultate the chest for adequate ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 观察胸廓起伏并行肺部听诊明确是否充分换气。

sentences.english: Some children can cover the whole length of the pool without coming up for breath even once.
sentences.chinese: 有些孩子能够跑完游泳池的全长而不用露出水面换气。

definition: to feel suffocated or oppressed/to choke with resentment/to feel injured or resentful
to exhale/to blow off steam/(phonetics) aspirated
to kick one's legs/leg press (exercise)/(coll.) to kick the bucket
